title: Doom bots actually come out?
body: So i just updated my LoL with patch 6.21 and it mentioned that Doom Bots were out, but i cant really find the game mode or anything related, is this just an announcement or is something wrong?

replies.body: Doombot are schedule to come out during the rotating game mode which starts on the weekend.  The schedule can be found [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-24).  Hope that helps clear things up!
If i remember well Doom Bots of DOOM starts tomorrow according to the game mode rotation
